name: pine
description: Pine is free minimalist WordPress portfolio theme created for people who want to show their work on simple and creative way. Pine is made for a freelancers, designers or smaller agencies who are looking for elegant, professional and minimal look.

scripts.prepare: npm run prepare:dependencies && npm run build:all
scripts.prepare:all: npm run prepare:dependencies && npm run build:all
scripts.build: npm run build:less && npm run build:less:admin && npm run build:js && npm run build:js:vendors && npm run build:js:customizer && npm run build:js:admin
scripts.build:all: npm run build:less && npm run build:less:admin && npm run build:js && npm run build:js:vendors && npm run build:js:customizer && npm run build:js:admin

author: Slicejack
